summary: Ace Bonner returns to Arizona several years after he abandoned his family, Junior Bonner is a wild young man. Against the typical rodeo championship, family drama erupts.
cast: Steve McQueen|Robert Preston|Ida Lupino|Ben Johnson|Joe Don Baker|Barbara Leigh|Mary Murphy|Bill McKinney|Dub Taylor|Sandra Deel|Don 'Red' Barry|Charles H. Gray|Matthew Peckinpah|Sundown Spencer|Rita Garrison|Roxanne Knight|Sandra Pew|William E. Pierce|P.K. Strong|Toby Michaels|Bonnie Clausing|Francesca Jarvis|George Weintraub|June Simpson|Lynette Carrington|James M. George|Rod Hart|Wayne McLaren|Johnnie Mullens|Sam Peckinpah|Sharon Peckinpah|James Shreeve|Casey Tibbs
title: El rey del rodeo
